name: Glorious Season
description: When your Barbara, who has this card equipped, is on the field, Melody Loop will allow you to spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character." (Once per round)
descriptionraw: When your $[A1201], who has this card equipped, is on the field, <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112011]</color> will allow you to spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character." (Once per round)
descriptionreplaced: When your Barbara, who has this card equipped, is on the field, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Melody Loop</color> will allow you to spend 1 less Elemental Die the next time you use "Switch Character." (Once per round)
